tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SolarFarmInstallations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    developer_id INT,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    forecasted_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    actual_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE solar_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_forecasts (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    expenses DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    profit DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    forecast_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE solar_farms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area FLOAT,
    capacity FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    forecast DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    revenue FLOAT,
    expenses FLOAT,
    profit FLOAT,
    year INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES solar_farms(id)
)

CREATE TABLE forecasts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    date DATE,
    energy_output FLOAT,
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES solar_farms(id)
)

CREATE TABLE solar_farms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    capacity FLOAT,
    installation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    solar_farm_id INT,
    revenue FLOAT,
    expenses FLOAT,
    profit FLOAT,
    year INT
)

CREATE TABLE forecasts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    solar_farm_id INT,
    forecast_date DATE,
    predicted_revenue FLOAT,
    predicted_expenses FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE developers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    company VARCHAR,
    country VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Financials (
    financial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10,2),
    expenses DECIMAL(10,2),
    net_income DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Solar_Panels (
    panel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    efficiency DECIMAL(5,2),
    purchase_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Forecasts (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    revenue_forecast DECIMAL(10,2),
    expenses_forecast DECIMAL(10,2),
    net_income_forecast DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects (project_id)
);
